description: Model class representing a poll with properties such as id, title, options, and results, including constructor and getter methods.

classes.name: Poll
classes.description: A data model class encapsulating poll information including id, title, options, and results.

methods.name: Poll
methods.description: Constructor for the Poll class, initializing id, title, options, and results.

methods.name: getOptions
methods.description: Returns the list of options available in the poll.

methods.name: getResults
methods.description: Returns the list of results corresponding to poll options.
